title: Melania Trump's Movie Premiere at the Kennedy Center
summary: Melania Trump, the first lady, made a documentary about her life as she returned to the White House with her husband, Donald Trump. The movie, called 'Melania,' had its first showing at the Kennedy Center in Washington, D.C. She said the film shows her daily life, including her work, family, and setting up her team. The documentary will play in theaters around the world and later on Amazon Prime Video. Many important people, like government officials, came to watch it. Donald Trump liked the movie and said it brings back glamour. Melania hopes to share her story with everyone.
